bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of heat-type diseases affecting the small intestine. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 15: 小腸象火，旺 於夏。手太陽其經也，心之腑也。水液之下行為溲便者，流於小腸。其 氣盛為有餘，則病小腸熱，焦竭乾澀，小腸昔脹，是為小腸之氣實也， 則宜瀉之 , “The small intestine is the image of fire; it flourishes in summer. The hand major yang [conduit] is its conduit. It is the palace associated with the heart [depot]. When water-liquids are passed down to be discharged as urine, they flow into the small intestine. When it abounds, this will bring forth a surplus, and the resulting disease will be heat in the small intestine . Its desiccation will make passage through it rough, and the small intestine will eventually distend. The reason is a qi repletion in the small intestine which needs to be drained”.
